detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Textured-knit wool jumper with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft, lightweight wool jersey with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft, lightweight wool jersey with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft, lightweight wool jersey with an elasticated waist.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft, lightweight wool jersey with an elasticated waist.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft, lightweight wool jersey with press-studs on the shoulders and a gently rounded hem.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft, lightweight wool jersey with press-studs on the shoulders and a gently rounded hem.

Set with a shirt, sweater vest and bow tie or tie. Shirt in a cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. V-neck sweater vest in fine-knit cotton with ribbed trims. Pre-tied tie/bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.

Set with a shirt, sweater vest and bow tie or tie. Shirt in a cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. V-neck sweater vest in fine-knit cotton with ribbed trims. Pre-tied tie/bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved shirt in a checked cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in a checked cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Two-button jacket in a textured cotton weave with a chest pocket and flap welt pockets at the front. Contrasting colour elbow patches, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Two-button jacket in a textured cotton weave with a chest pocket and flap welt pockets at the front. Contrasting colour elbow patches, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a shirt and pair of trousers in a cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Matching, detachable bow tie. Regular-fit trousers in twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.

Set with a shirt and pair of trousers in a cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Matching, detachable bow tie. Regular-fit trousers in twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.

Long-sleeved shirt with a bow tie and waistcoat in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Waistcoat with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.

Long-sleeved shirt with a bow tie and waistcoat in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Waistcoat with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.

Set with a shirt and pair of chinos in a soft cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Pre-tied bow tie with an elastic strap and fastener at the back. Lightly brushed chinos with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and side pockets. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.

Jacket in soft cotton velvet with notch lapels and buttons at the front. Chest pocket with a decorative handkerchief, fake welt front pockets with a flap, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Patterned lining.

Jacket in soft cotton velvet with notch lapels and buttons at the front. Chest pocket with a decorative handkerchief, fake welt front pockets with a flap, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Patterned lining.

Jacket in washed cotton denim with sewn-on sequins, a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Short jacket in woven fabric with decorative embroidery and lace trims. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and ties at the front.
Lightweight jacket in mesh with dangling sequins. No fasteners. Jersey lining.

Short dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Deep V-neck, wrapover top and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a raw-edge hem.
